summary: The Small Business Technological Act of 2025 aims to authorize small business loans to finance the acquisition of modern business software, cloud computing services, and related technologies. It amends Section 7(a) of the Small Business Act to include these technologies as eligible uses for SBA loans. The bill clarifies that this amendment doesn't retroactively invalidate previous loans for similar purposes, prohibits loans for research and development, and doesn't alter the definition of working capital.
